title: jmriqi
author: jmriqi
content: QuoteMcDonalds first official 2000 piece digital art collection only launched hours ago; already 89% of the 2000 monsters are already mined, offering hope that the Mc-Meme appeal may help to revive the ailing digital art market, as floor values soarhttps://nft.mcdonalds.comWell, I minted one. Disappointing theres only the Grimace character, kinda ugly ngl

comments.author: kingvirtus09
comments.body: Quote from: jmriqi on October 04, 2023, 02:54:05 AMQuoteMcDonalds first official 2000 piece digital art collection only launched hours ago; already 89% of the 2000 monsters are already mined, offering hope that the Mc-Meme appeal may help to revive the ailing digital art market, as floor values soarhttps://nft.mcdonalds.comWell, I minted one. Disappointing theres only the Grimace character, kinda ugly nglDoes that mean that you received an NFT in that link, provided that you have to connect to Metamask or any of their choices? Is there only one NFT to choose from, or do they provide the NFT for you?I just don't understand why McDonald's is still releasing such promotions about NFT. Is McDonald's really behind this? Or is this the link you are talking about? https://decrypt.co/152743/grimace-forever-mcdonalds-giving-away-free-nfts-that-you-cant-tradeAll I know is that there are some McDonalds that accept Bitcoin payments in other countries.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: I think this topic is obsolete as it is no more active. I checked the date of start to be 21st of August which is also a month plus since it started and believe me this would take up to an hour before the airdrop is finished unset from launch. Why I was wondering why you did not make this post with your real account why coming to make this post with a new account.
